Some Info on Moon RIsing (aka Greatest Story ever denied Parts I, II and III)
In 2009, Jose Escamilla produced Moon Rising, a three part documentary based on his work colorizing 274 photos of the moon. As well, his movie exposes the epic cover-up of what the Moon is, what is up there, what is looks like, and so much more. We thought it was time to revisit this important film that exposes the greatest story ever denied.

Here is the official description of Moon Rising:
On February 25,1994 1.8 million photos were taken of the Moon during the Clementine Mission. Different variations were taken including Full Color photos. . . . This is the first time in human history the Moon is being revealed to you in its Full Natural Color.

On the matter concerning whether or not we went to the Moon, we landed there without a doubt. This film is about what was waiting for us when we got there and the lies put in motion in order to conceal what was found. Moon researchers and investigators appearing in this film disclose facts hidden from you for over forty years. The facts will amaze and shock you at the same time. You may ask yourself why these lies have been impressed upon us all these year


RODS - A Strange UFO Mystery:
Feature Film by Jose Escamilla and UFOTV. Rods are cylindrical or cigar shaped objects that have been discovered appearing in the skies. The objects are not like the typical "cigar" shaped UFOS that have been reported throughout history.

The following are characteristics of Rods gathered over the past five years of videotaped evidence and research: They are from four inches to a few feet in length. Some are thin like spears. Some Rods have what appear to be "appendages" along their torsos resembling Centipedes. They travel at extremely high velocities barely visible with the naked eye. They do exhibit some form of intelligence. They are appearing everywhere. They don't appear to be mechanical or made of metal. They appear to be alive!

Jose Escamilla has been editing film and video for over 17 years and has produced many films and arranged and performed all the music for Tito Guizar, well known as the Mexican Troubador. He has also appeared on many national TV and radio broadcasts.


CELESTIAL:

The film that challenges anyone to prove that the Moon is grey.
